content.text: Plavin 6 was an Imperial planet of dense rainforests. It was the homeworld of Dr. Nash Llalik and his family.

Llalik's second son Nashiak kept a home in Plavin 6. He stored there two incomplete prototypes of Sunder 9 armor after being forced to scrap the project. The prototypes where watched by a droid security dettachment.
Later, when Dr. Nashiak Llalik's work made him rich, he built a manor on Plavin 6, hoping to return there one day to live without stress.
